title: Constructing drain surrounded double gate structure in AlGaN/GaN HEMT for boosting breakdown voltage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22238-22243
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03508A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zehui Peng, Huangbai Liu, Hao Yu, Lei Li, Kuan-Chang Chang
A structure of drain-surrounded double gate (DSDG) is proposed for AlGaN/GaN HEMT to enhance breakdown voltage by nearly 100 V and alleviate the drain-induced barrier lowering (DIBL) effect.
